name: @orcaslicer/cli
description: Node.js bindings for OrcaSlicerCli (N-API), enabling programmatic slicing

scripts.configure: node -e "(async()=>{const { CMake } = require('cmake-js'); const cm=new CMake({ runtime: 'node', CMakeOptions: ['-DORCACLI_BUILD_NODE_ADDON=ON','-DORCASLICER_ROOT_DIR=../../../OrcaSlicer']}); await cm.configure();})()"
scripts.build: node -e "(async()=>{const { CMake } = require('cmake-js'); const cm=new CMake({ runtime: 'node', CMakeOptions: ['-DORCACLI_BUILD_NODE_ADDON=ON','-DORCASLICER_ROOT_DIR=../../../OrcaSlicer']}); await cm.build();})()"
scripts.test: node test/smoke.js && node test/unit.js && node test/e2e.js
scripts.slice:all:resources:quiet: ORCACLI_LOG_LEVEL=1 ORCACLI_QUIET=1 cmake -S ../.. -B ../../build -DORCACLI_BUILD_NODE_ADDON=ON -DORCACLI_ENABLE_ASAN=OFF && cmake --build ../../build --target orcaslicer_node -j4 && ORCACLI_RESOURCES=../../../OrcaSlicer/resources node test/slice_compare.js
scripts.pack:local: npm run build && echo 'Artifacts under build/bindings/node'
scripts.prebuild: npm run configure && npm run build && npm run prebuild:stage
